reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the development of new insolvency practices in India to improve the business environment.

description.narrative: To support Indian decision-makers and professionals in developing a robust insolvency practice in India, through engagement with UK insolvency professionals and decision-makers on their experience of the insolvency process. The programme will also help bring greater certainty to the business environment for international companies, including UK companies when investing in India. Bringing benefits to British business in sectors where they are well placed to compete including, energy and low carbon; urban and smart cities; ease of doing business; financial services; and skills.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
